>
[House of Imaginary Walls](/Feats.aspx?ID=198) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 102 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real. You learn the [_house of imaginary walls_](/Spells.aspx?ID=384) composition cantrip.
name: House of Imaginary Walls
